price: [It will be said,] “Read your record; this Day you are sufficient to take account of yourself[12].”
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا
footnotes: [12] Everyone will be dealt with justly.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
